question: Udyani Mane, who was in news recently, is an Indian player of which sports?
explanation:
Udayan Mane was recently seen in news, as the Pune-based Golfer recently won the TATA Steel PGTI Players Championship. He defeated his fellow player Veer Ahlawat of Gurugram.
Udayan Mane has also clinched the last two PGTI events including the TATA Steel Tour Championship 2019 and Golconda Masters 2020. He became only the second player to win three consecutive events of the TATA Steel PGTI.
